[[Version 1.6]]
*Increased damage from Elemental Mastery for Overloaded.
*Increased the base damage for player-triggered Overloaded above Level 60
** Previously, the base damage for players was identical to the base damage for enemies and environment.
----
[[Version 1.2]]
*(Continuation from a related fix in 1.1) Adjusted the strength of the Overloaded DMG done by burning grass to targets affected by Electro. The DMG from this Elemental Reaction was adjusted to 2 World Levels below the Traveler's current World Level.
----
[[Version 1.0]]
*Overloaded was released.
